title: Where can I recharge the RP in this new LOL store UI?
body: I just can't find where is the charge ??

replies.body: I don't believe that feature has been enabled yet on the alpha client.  I recommend bookmarking the [alpha client boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) for any updates on that.  Hopefully, it will be available in no time!
